Demon Wulf/Fresh Ripper/Dark Claw:


The egg shaped craft powers up its engines and blasts off, in the blink of the eye hovering over Mt. St. Hilary.  It flashes green, and three robots appear on the brim of the volcano, the black craft's engines deactivating, sending the craft plummeting into lava.
